docs.text: We will review together for best achievement

docs.title: Unit One : Numbers and operations on them
Ratio
docs.text:
A ratio is a method of comparing two quantity of the same kind

expresses the relationship between a part and a part, a part and a whole, or a whole and a part

docs.title: Example 1
docs.text: your class in school has 50 students, 30 boys, and 20 girls. Write the ratio between the following 1. the number of boys to the total number in class 2. the number of girls to the number of boys 3. the total number of students to the number of girls

docs.title: Solution
docs.text:
1. the number of boys to the total number in class $$ \frac{30}{50} $$
  2. the number of girls to the number of boys $$ \frac{20}{30} $$
  3. the total number of students to the number of girls $$ \frac{50}{20} $$

docs.title: Equivalent Ratio
docs.text: ببساطه يا حج سيف بضرب البسط والمقام في نفس الرقم او قسمت البسط والمقام على نفس الرقم

docs.title: Example 2
docs.text:
1. write two equivalent to $$ \frac{16}{24} $$
  2. if $$ \frac={6}{X}=\frac{3}{4}, what is the value of X?

docs.title: Solution
docs.text:
1. write two equivalent to $$ \frac{16}{24} $$
    • Multiply: $$ \frac{16×2}{24×2}=\frac{32}{48} $$
    • Divide: $$ \frac{16÷8}{24÷8}=\frac{2}{3} $$
  2. if $$ \frac{6}{X}=\frac{3}{4}, what is the value of X?
